tier1Multiplier.name: Tier 1 Multiplier (Encumbered)
tier1Multiplier.hint: Multiplier for Strength to calculate the first encumbrance tier (default: 5)

tier2Multiplier.name: Tier 2 Multiplier (Heavily Encumbered)
tier2Multiplier.hint: Multiplier for Strength to calculate the second encumbrance tier (default: 10)

tier3Multiplier.name: Tier 3 Multiplier (Exceeding Carrying Capacity)
tier3Multiplier.hint: Multiplier for Strength to calculate the third encumbrance tier (default: 15)

enableEffects.name: Enable Encumbrance Effects
enableEffects.hint: When enabled, applies custom temporary effects based on encumbrance tier

currencyPerWeight.name: Currency per Weight
currencyPerWeight.hint: Number of coins that equal 1 pound of weight (default: 50)
